void markSuspect(int i,
                 int j,
                 boolean flag)
           throws NeatTriangulator.InternalException
Mark an edge as either a suspect or not

Parameters:
i - The index of the first vert
j - The index of the second vert
flag - True if the edge is a suspect
Throws:
NeatTriangulator.InternalException - Indicates the edge didn't exist
